alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 4:31AM MST until January 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches, locally up to 12 inches Ogden Valley. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Widespread winter driving conditions are expected. Prepare for possible traction restrictions along relevant routes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
